INTEGRITY_ADVERTISEMENT_PERIOD.name: Length of advertisement period
INTEGRITY_ADVERTISEMENT_PERIOD.desc: Share of contracts for which the length of time between the call for tender publication and the bid deadline was not significantly different from other contracts' advertisement period.

INTEGRITY_CALL_FOR_TENDER_PUBLICATION.name: Call for tenders publication
INTEGRITY_CALL_FOR_TENDER_PUBLICATION.desc: Share of contracts for which the call for tender was published prior to a contract award increasing the potential bidder pool.

INTEGRITY_PROCEDURE_TYPE.name: Procedure type
INTEGRITY_PROCEDURE_TYPE.desc: Share of contracts for which open procedures were used which are more open for competition.

INTEGRITY_DECISION_PERIOD.name: Length of decision period
INTEGRITY_DECISION_PERIOD.desc: Share of contracts for which the length of the period from bid deadline to decision on contract award was not significantly different from other contracts' decision period.

INTEGRITY_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH.name: Description length
INTEGRITY_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH.desc: Share of contracts where the product description is excessively long which may indicate the risk of product description being tailored to one company.

INTEGRITY_WINNER_CA_SHARE.name: Winner contract share
INTEGRITY_WINNER_CA_SHARE.desc: Winner's contract share is the share of contract value won by a given company from a given buyer in a given year. The low value of this indicator signals the risk of the buyer being dependent on one or few companies which may lead to vulnerability for extortion and corruption.

INTEGRITY_SINGLE_BID.name: Single bidder contract
INTEGRITY_SINGLE_BID.desc: Share of contracts where more than one bids were received.

INTEGRITY_SIGNATURE_PERIOD.name: Length of signature period
INTEGRITY_SIGNATURE_PERIOD.desc: Share of contracts for which the period between the contract award and the contract signature date is not significantly different from other contracts' signature period.

TRANSPARENCY_BUYER_NAME_MISSING.name: Buyer's name available
TRANSPARENCY_BUYER_NAME_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which buyer's name is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_YEAR_MISSING.name: Year info available
TRANSPARENCY_YEAR_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which year is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_TITLE_MISSING.name: Tender title available
TRANSPARENCY_TITLE_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which title is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_NAME_MISSING.name: Bidder's name available
TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_NAME_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which bidder's name is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_ID_MISSING.name: Bidder's ID available
TRANSPARENCY_BIDDER_ID_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which bidder's ID is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_CA_TYPE_MISSING.name: Supply type available
TRANSPARENCY_CA_TYPE_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which supply type is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_VALUE_MISSING.name: Contract value available
TRANSPARENCY_VALUE_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which contract value is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BUYER_LOC_MISSING.name: Buyer's location available
TRANSPARENCY_BUYER_LOC_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which buyer's location is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_PROC_METHOD_MISSING.name: Procedure type available
TRANSPARENCY_PROC_METHOD_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which procedure type is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_BID_NR_MISSING.name: Number of bids available
TRANSPARENCY_BID_NR_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which number of bids is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_AWARD_DATE_MISSING.name: Award date available
TRANSPARENCY_AWARD_DATE_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which award date is available in the published notice.

TRANSPARENCY_SIGN_DATE_MISSING.name: Contract signature date available
TRANSPARENCY_SIGN_DATE_MISSING.desc: Share of contracts for which contract signature date is available in the published notice.
